head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOFENSON, JACK L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOFENSON, JACK L.

block.p: MOFENSON-Jack L. Sales Executive. On May 20, 1997. Age 96. Formerly of Mineola, New York and Deerfield Beach, Florida. Devoted husband of the late Theresa. Loving father of Howard and Robert and grandfather of Lynne, Jeffrey Glenn and Dayna and great-grandfather of Jeffrey, Jessica and Courtney. A private funeral was held on May 22, 1997.

MOFENSON-Jack L. Sales Executive. On May 20, 1997. Age 96. Formerly of Mineola, New York and Deerfield Beach, Florida. Devoted husband of the late Theresa. Loving father of Howard and Robert and grandfather of Lynne, Jeffrey Glenn and Dayna and great-grandfather of Jeffrey, Jessica and Courtney. A private funeral was held on May 22, 1997.
